Class MulticoreMaxwellProvider

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.technical.backend.algorithms.MulticoreMaxwellProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
MaxwellProvider
public class MulticoreMaxwellProvider extends Object implements MaxwellProvider
Multicore (Analytical) implementation of MaxwellProvider. Computes the electromagnetic field as a superposition of oscillating dipoles.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
